name: Wizard But Pew Pew
description:
Imagine if wizards had guns, pretty scary rite? But some group of bats thought it isn't. Prevent them from reaching the other side by shooting them with the guns u find in the chests!!! 

Left Click To Shoot

W S A D to move or the ARROW keys

E to pick up guns, and open guns

Some Stats:

Power Ups:

Pepsi Gives Attack Speed

Health Potion Gives Health

The Thunder Power Up gives a speed Increase

The Coin Multiplier gives extra coins after each kill

Credits:

The Dungeon Tile Sheet : 2D Pixel Art Dungeon Tileset by Elthen's Pixel Art Shop (itch.io)

The BG Music : Lonelyhood | OpenGameArt.org
